name: tap and switch color
description:
Get ready to join the fun.

Tap and switch color is the best game to kill time.

With many fun, addicting, colorful and fast game.

Tap and jump between bricks, try not to fall, while doing that switch your color if the next bricks' color not as your color.

Collect coins and bonus special coins to unlock new colors, new characters, and new bricks.

Let's tap and switch color.
